prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a young man, Jase, my boyfriend and college roommate. He has short blond hair and wears glasses. He's slightly shorter than me and a year younger. He's affectionately clinging to my arm, his expression a mix of playful mischief and sweet dependence.  His features are soft and youthful, with a hint of mischievousness in his eyes. He's wearing casual college attire.  The lighting is soft and intimate, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.
